nodes.text: Regency Spires Imperial Trust was a bank that operated on the planet Ralltiir during the reign of the Galactic Empire. Led by the Human Bosrik Mak-Ageejay, the trust was one of the few banks on Ralltiir to weather the Empire's subjugation of the world in 1 BBY, due to the fact that the majority of its clientale were Imperial officers and advisors. However, unknown to the bank's clients, Mak-Ageejay secretly used the bank's funds to purchase arms for the Rebel Alliance.
